On May 18, 2010, Souder announced his resignation from Congress, after admitting to an extramarital affair with one of his part-time female staff members.Souder to resign, Goshen News, 2010 May 18 (accessed 2010 May 18). In January 2022, Souder was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer.
